data_collection_explanation_post: the datum collect should be qualitative and quantitative . quantitative method of the day would include for example different analytic of student , such as demographic information . however , qualitative datum , collect with interview , anecdote , observation be going need as well . the datum should include for example the challenge or goal of student , and capture the key element and typical behavior of the student to create a realistic persona of a typical marketing course student . perhaps also datum of the learn style of student could be beneficial in create the student persona . also , the persona should be update once in a while by collect more datum to include different trend etc . , since they can " expire " so to say . the data collection should , however , regard the legal aspect , such as GDPR .
data_analysis_explanation_post: the datum would be segment base on the key characteristic of the student , for example utilize analytical method , such as Matrix factoring and cluster analysis to separate different group of learner from each other . so , to separate the user type and tailor the persona to they .
persona_building_explanation_post: the persona profile should be brief summary of the key characteristic of student - for example one slide or a4 of description with a picture make with Canva or other tool . the profile can be create e.g. by give the personas name , backstorie , include the goal and the challenge of the persona - and thus make they more human - like . this include also their typical behavior .
evaluation_explanation_post: the evaluation of the persona should be do internally and externally . internal testing mean analytical test and external e.g. user testing or A / b - testing . the   quality of the data play a big role in here , because from lack datum you can not create a sufficient student persona that would work in real - life situation , such as in classroom . reason for poor datum might be over reliance to quantitative datum .

persona_explanation_pre:
- You need to have the correct target niche for persona's to be effective. 
- Understanding the challenges and pain points of your target niche and that the persona reflects those accurately. 
- Measuring effectiveness
-Evolving and changing consumer needs 
-Their are more than a single persona that any one brand or company needs, so there is a lot to manage.
data_collection_explanation_post:
what datum to collect : 1 ) you need demographic information ( age , gender , location , etc . ) ; 2 ) student background ( major , previous education , etc . ) ; 3 ) behavioral datum ( course participation , online interaction ) ; 4 ) preference ( learn style , content engagement , etc . ) . 
 how to collect : you can use : 1)automate system of evolve online interaction ; 2 ) social medium analytic ; or , 3 ) focus group . 
 how much : the sample need to be large enough to produce statistically significant datum to ensure representativeness .
data_analysis_explanation_post:
you can segment the datum on attribute via : 1 ) cluster behavior and demographic ( e.g. , age ) ; 2 ) statistical algorithm to identify pattern 

 you need diverse segment that be illustrative of the range of student .
persona_building_explanation_post: you need a persona to encapsulate the need and characteristic of the group , give each persona a name , image and detailed description of goal and pattern of behavior .
evaluation_explanation_post:
you need to test persona with real decision and feedback.- ask student or stakeholder to validate persona against experience . you need continuous data collection and evaluation because demographic and behavior pattern change . 

 persona be important because they can help a teacher create : psychological engagement ( empathy towards how student learn ) ; focus on user goal in teaching ; challenge assumption ( i.e. , challenger teacher assumption of student ) ; promote inclusivity ; and , facilitate user - center design .

data_collection_explanation_post: Persoonan luomisen pohjaksi kannattaa kerätä hyvin monipuolisesti erilaista sekä kvalitatiivista että kvantitatiivista aineistoa . Haastattelujen ja havainnoinnin avulla sekä erilaisilla kyselyillä voisi kerätä esim . seuraavia tietoja : henkilön demografiset taustat , valokuvia henkilöstä . Voisi kerätä sekä havainnoimalla että kyselyillä tietoja siitä , miten henkilö toimii vastaavanlaisessa oppimistilanteessa esim . miten paljon kysymyksiä esittää , keskustelee tovereiden kanssa , tekee muistiinpanoja ym . Keräisin myös tietoa mm . aiemmasta koulutuksesta ja aiemmista opinnoista sekä opintomenestyksestä eri tyypisissä aineissa . Lisäksi keräisin tietoa erilaisista persoonallisuuden piirteistä , oppimistyylistä ( sekä mm . siitä minkälaiset oppimissisällöt henkilö kokee vaikeiksi tai helpoiksi , oppiiko parhaiten ryhmässä vai yksin ... ) , opiskelutottumuksista , opintotavoitteista , kunnianhimosta , älykkyydestä , arvoista sekä asenteista liittyen opetetaviin sisältöihin sekä liittyen oppimiseen ja omaan osaamiseen .
data_analysis_explanation_post: Erilaisia klusterointimenetelmiä voidaan käyttää segmentoimaan kvantitatiivisia tietoja ja toki myös kvantitatiiviseksi luokiteltuja kvalitatiivisia tietoja .
persona_building_explanation_post: Segmenttien ominaisuuksien perusteella luodaan kuvaus segmentistä , jota sitten täydennetään laadullisen aineiston tarjoamilla yksityiskohdilla kuten kuvilla , esimerkki mielipiteillä tms . Näin luodaan kuvaus kuvitteellisesta henkilöstä , joka havainnollistaa elävästi ja esimerkinomaisesti minkälainen ihminen on tyypillinen tämän segmentin edustaja . opettaja räätälöi opetuksen erikseen jokaiselle persoonalle .
evaluation_explanation_post: kerätään tietoa oppimistuloksista ja opiskelijoiden kokemuksista ; siitä miten he kokivat valitun oppimistavan . Opiskelijat voisivat myös itse arvioida kuinka hyvin se persoona , johon heidän katsotaan kuuluvan , heidä omasta mielestään kuvaa heitä . Verrataan oppimistuloksia ja opiskelijoiden oppimiskokemuksia kahden opiskelijaryhmän välillä a ) tavanomaista opetusta saaneet vs. 2 ) persoonoihin perustuvaa opetusta saaneet

data_collection_explanation_post:
the limited time discussion with the bot do not allow I to get to this task assignment . the discussion lead to some detail on evaluation method between expert and student and be not focus on the task . 

 however , base on previous knowledge I would do this : 
 look at Records : check uni info like age , grade , and what other class people have take . 
 ask question : use online survey to ask student about their goal , struggle , and how they like to learn marketing . 
 talk to student : chat with some student to really understand what make they tick , what they want from the class , etc . 
 - Group discussion : get small group of student together to talk about their experience and what they expect from the course or the degree in general .
data_analysis_explanation_post:
Group Similar Students : use computer tool to put student into group base on what they have in common . 
 figure out the most important thing that influence how student act in the class . 
 read through what student say in interview and focus group and find common theme . 
 Group student base on how involved they be , how they learn , and what job they want in the future
persona_building_explanation_post:
pick Important Traits : choose 5 - 7 thing that describe each " fake student , " like their age , goal , challenge , and how they like to learn . 
 make up a story for each " fake student , " give they a name , a background , and describe how they usually act . 
 find a picture that fit each " fake student " and put all their info in an easy - to - read format . 
 use a template : keep all the " fake student " profile organize and consistent .
evaluation_explanation_post:
ask new student to pick which " fake student " be most like they . if most student can find a match , we be on the right track . this be to be do at the beginning of the academic year and useful for all course . 
 - create class material that be design for each " fake student " and see if student be more interested in one or the other activity . evaluate which activity be good . 
  ask other teacher if the " fake student " seem like real student they have teach . 
 on a yearly basis , keep improve the " fake student " as we get new information and feedback .

data_analysis_explanation_post: the data analysis should be base on map out the pattern in datum . for quantitative datum basic method use for segmentation such as cluster analysis rely on K - means method can be apply . for qualitative datum typical method for large qualitative datum such as NLP can be apply .
persona_building_explanation_post: the create persona would be describe as richly as possible , consist on info such as fictitious name , trait , background story , what kind of goal and challenge they possibly face and how they may be solve . the persona should be visualize for example use canva or ppt .
evaluation_explanation_post: it need to be understand that persona be not static but change in time , for example each year the group of student be a bit different , so update be need regularly . also , it be important that persona be not only rely on quantitative datum , but to ensure deep understanding qualitative datum be need as well , for instance interview student . both internal ( e.g. user testing ) and external validation can be use for ensure trustworthiness of datum . the aspect relate to ethic need to be take care of , for example datum protection , privacy concern and anonymity .

data_collection_explanation_post: data - drive persona from marketing student can be create by collect many type of datum . you can collect qualitative datum ( interview and focus group ) and find out how student learn , what motivation they have in learning , and what challenge they face . you should also collect quantitative datum to complete the understanding . these can include web - analytic , social medium interaction ( e.g. watch your teach video from youtube ) , time spend with chatbot , survey datum and Learning Management System datum ( how student perform in their study ) . the ideal sample size be between 30 and 300 . you need to be careful with research ethic when collect the datum .
data_analysis_explanation_post: after collect the datum , you need to analyse it . first , you need to define the variable you will use when segment the student into group . variable include behavioral variable and demographic , also attitude could be include . then you will use statistical technology to cluster the datum . this produce typically 3 - 7 segment . Cluster can be combine during the process . finally , you need to iterate and refine the analysis until you get segment that be credible .
persona_building_explanation_post: persona be build from the segmentation datum . again , you can start by identify the key attribute ( demographic , behavior , attitude ) . then you can create profile that have name , demographic , physical appearance , individual goal , need and life purpose . remember to include emotional variable . next , you can make the visual representation of the profile . after the visualization , refine the result . finally , document and share the persona .
evaluation_explanation_post: evaluation of the persona create be important . there be several evaluation criterion that should be use . these include the reliability and validity criterion , such as credibility , consistency , completeness and usefulness . it be also important to collect feedback from the participant themselves and from the user of the persona .

base on the datum , student can be segment accord to various variable , such as :

 for example , use a clustering algorithm : machine learn method such as K - mean can help find natural group in datum
persona_building_explanation_post:
once the datum have be analyze , a few typical student persona can be form that resemble a real person , a persona that , however , do not fully represent any natural person . 

 such a persona be often give a name , a picture , age , etc . demographic characteristic , as well as hobby and interest . information that can be infer base on the analyzed datum .
evaluation_explanation_post: the persona create should be validate , i.e. check to see how accurate and useful they actually be . validation can be do , for example , through A / b testing . in a classroom situation , it can also be do through a feedback survey . dynamic persona be unlikely to be create from student , so the persona create will become outdated over time if they be not update .

data_analysis_explanation_post: the first step be to create segment ( demographic , behavioral , psychograpich etc . ) . from there , we can use so call cluster algorithm for a deep analysis of the first segmentation round , and from there start building identity ( persona building ) . all this be do with a computer of course :) :) :)
persona_building_explanation_post: after all the segmentation , clustering and individualization for the first persona prototype , they need to be test to ensure they be relevant and interesting for the user . this can be do with use qualitative research insight as well as test they on the student by survey or similar feedback gathering activity . finally , when there be enough information , these persona can be give identity with characteristic such as gender , age , face and body etc .
evaluation_explanation_post:
how to assess the credibility and representativeness of persona ? 
 it seem that the persona can be test for inconsistency by compare they to the exist datum . also , the perception of the user be important here , as they decide how they relate to these data - drive persona . so be these identity consider realistic and relatable ? finally , and this tie to the question of ethic as well , it be important to follow the construction timeline . this be call algorithm transparency and mean provide a clear picture of how the persona be construct .

data_collection_explanation_post:
this task should actually be do before the course start in order to plan the course well , e.g. in the open university . I would like to know e.g. time they have for study , be they work fulltime / half / not at all , when they can study ( e.g. only at the evening / weekend etc . ) , what be their goal ( actual learning or just to get the credit ) , what be their background ( occupation , work experience in the teach subject / elsewhere ) , do they prefer online ( asyncronuous or syncronous)or face - to - face . there could be a survey they answer before the course start . 

 in the case of a company and its customer , the data collection would be more extensive
data_analysis_explanation_post: in this case , simple quantitative metric and qualitative analysis of open end question would be enough . then some cluster maybe to form segment
persona_building_explanation_post: some cluster perhaps . also in the case of marketing course , the most relevant question would be the time they can spend on study and their goal , because it would be beneficial to mix different knowledge level / background student . but if their goal be just to pass , they can be a burden in group that have high goal
evaluation_explanation_post:
I could then divide the student to different group base on these persona . I could ask their opinion if they feel that they be in the right group , ( because the number be not that many ) , also at the end of the course , there could be a survey . 
 however , in a course set , I be not sure how much I be able to differentiate the assignment etc . but for group formation purpose the persona could be useful
